channel.title: Need help for newbie
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys,[/b] I just started to create a server (allstar-scape v2) and I don't know much about it. I need answers to: 1. How to change new player spawn place. 2. How to add NPCs 3. How to create commands 4. How to change NPCs drop.
Can anyone help me ??? Who will help me - will get moderator for free :cool: :rolleyes:

item.title: Need help for newbie
item.dc:creator: @Kwia Kwia
item.description:
@Kwia wrote:

Good Luck With Your Server. :]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Sw3das Sw3das
item.description:
@Sw3das wrote:

If you want to see your cord just write ::mypos in chat
And thanks. You realy helped ;).
When i build my server you will be mod ofcourse …

Read full topic

item.title: Need help for newbie
item.dc:creator: @Kwia Kwia
item.description:
@Kwia wrote:

To Change The Home…

Go Into The File “Client.JAVA”

And Search “Home” Until You Find… Ex. Ifcommandstartswith (Home) Or Something Like That…

And Than You’ll See 2 Sets Of Numbers Ex. 2048, 2935

Those Are The Home Coordinates At The Time Being… Go To Google.com And Search RSPS Tele Coordinates Unless You Already Have Your Tele Coords.

And Than Add Your New Coords Where The Old Ones Were. Hope This Helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help for newbie
item.dc:creator: @Sw3das Sw3das
item.description:
@Sw3das wrote:

I wrote it wrong.

  1. How to change home.
    Now thats what I need to know
    Thanks. If my server will work you will be the mod

Read full topic

item.title: Need help for newbie
item.dc:creator: @Kwia Kwia
item.description:
@Kwia wrote:

  1. How To Change A Player’s Starter Area.
    A: You’ll Have To Change The Home… And Than Search PlayerSpawn Or Player Spawn I Think And Change The Tele Coords.
  2. How to add NPCs
    A: Autospawn.CFG, And Shops.CFG I Think…
  3. How to create commands
    A: Go Into Client.JAVA And Search starter, Copy All That Change The “Starter” To What Ever You Want It To Say, And Change The Other Information Underneath It.
  4. How to change NPCs drop.
    A: Npcdrops.CFG I’m Sure, I’ve Never Really Messed With NPC Drops.

Read full topic
